snippet: While some in the G.O.P. aim to scar the Obama administration, Representative Dave Camp is hoping to turn voter anger into an effort to change the tax system.
abstract: Some Republican lawmakers aim to use Internal Revenue Service scandal to scar Obama administration, but Rep Dave Camp and others are hoping to turn voter anger into catalyst for overhauling tax code.
lead_paragraph: While some in the G.O.P. aim to scar the Obama administration, Representative Dave Camp is hoping to turn voter anger into an effort to change the tax system.

headline.seo: Some Republicans See I.R.S. Scandal Yielding Tax Reform
headline.main: Some Republicans See I.R.S. Troubles as Means to a Big Goal: Tax Overhaul
headline.print_headline: Some Republicans See I.R.S. Troubles as Means to a Big Goal: Tax Overhaul

keywords.value: House Committee on Ways and Means
keywords.name: organizations
